remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供的上下文信息包括导致触发器激发，修改的列在更新操作中，并且，对于数据定义语言 (DDL) 触发器，XML EventData 结构的操作的类型 （请参阅"Transact SQL参考"SQL Server 联机丛书中的），它描述触发操作。The contextual information provided includes the type of action that caused the trigger to fire, which columns were modified in an UPDATE operation, and, in the case of a data definition language (DDL) trigger, an XML EventData structure (see "Transact-SQL Reference" in SQL Server Books Online) that describes the triggering operation. 实例可从类，当代码运行时通过触发器内部属性。An instance of is available from the class, when the code is running inside a trigger through the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示对象用于确定如果发生操作。The following example shows a object being used to determine if an action occurred. 如果行插入到`user`的表、 用户名称和真实名称是从插入的行中检索并随后添加到**UserNameAudit**表。If a row was inserted into the `user`'s table, the user name and real name are retrieved from the inserted row and then added to the **UserNameAudit** table.
